Test Case Name: TC01_Add Designated Professional Services Exclusion ZC 3339 to GL and Auto-Add ZC 3676 to Umbrella_Casualty_New Business_AC1
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that when Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3339 is added to GL policy, the system automatically suggests adding ZC 3676 to the Umbrella sub-line.
Action: 1. Navigate to Phoenix application and log in with valid credentials
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to access the Phoenix application successfully and verify login is complete

Description: 2. Create a new domestic submission with Casualty lines
Action: 2. User should be able to create a new submission and verify submission ID is generated successfully
Scenario Type: 3. User should be able to view the Line Selection screen with all available products listed
column18: 1,,,4. Select General Liability (GL) and Umbrella (UMB) products"
column19: 4. User should be able to select both GL and UMB products and verify they are displayed as selected lines
column25: 1,,,5. Set Effective Date to Release Date as per policy requirements"
column26: 5. User should be able to set the effective date and verify it is displayed in the policy information screen
column33: 6. User should be able to view the GL Exposures screen with all mandatory fields displayed
column39: 1,,,7. Fill all mandatory fields in GL Exposures screen (Coverage Exposure
column42: 7. User should be able to enter all mandatory field values and verify data is accepted
column48: 1,,,8. Add Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3339 to GL sub-line"
column49: 8. User should be able to add the ZC 3339 exclusion and verify it is displayed in the GL exclusions list
column55: 1,,,9. Verify the system automatically suggests Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3676 for Umbrella"
column56: 9. User should see a system prompt or notification suggesting to add ZC 3676 exclusion to Umbrella sub-line
column63: 10. User should be able to view the Umbrella LOB screen with all mandatory fields and exclusion suggestions displayed
column69: 1,,,11. Verify Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3676 is available for selection"
column70: 11. User should be able to see the ZC 3676 exclusion available in the Umbrella exclusions list as suggested
column76: 1,,,12. Fill all mandatory fields in Umbrella screen"
column77: 12. User should be able to enter all mandatory field values for Umbrella and verify data is accepted
column83: 1,,,13. Price the policy by clicking Price button"
column84: 13. User should be able to click Price and verify pricing calculation completes without errors
column91: 14. User should be able to approve UW rules and verify pricing continues successfully
column97: 1,,,15. Generate Quote by clicking Quote button"
column98: 15. User should be able to click Quote and verify quote document is generated successfully
column104: 1,,,16. Verify quote displays both exclusions (ZC 3339 in GL and ZC 3676 in Umbrella)"
column105: 16. User should be able to view the quote document and verify both exclusions are properly listed in respective LOBs
column111: 1,,,17. Bind the policy by clicking Bind button"
column112: 17. User should be able to click Bind and verify policy is bound successfully with confirmation message
column118: 2,Manual,TC02_Remove Designated Professional Services Exclusion ZC 3676 from Umbrella when Already Selected_Casualty_New Business_AC2"
column119: The objective of this test case is to validate that the user has the ability to remove the Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3676 from Umbrella sub-line when it is already selected.
column120: 1. Navigate to Phoenix application and log in with valid credentials
column121: 1. User should be able to access the Phoenix application successfully and verify login is complete

Description: 2. Load the existing submission created in TC1
Action: 2. User should be able to successfully load the submission and verify all previously entered data is displayed correctly
Scenario Type: 3. User should be able to view the Umbrella LOB screen with the previously selected exclusion ZC 3676 displayed
column18: 2,,,4. Verify Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3676 is currently selected"
column19: 4. User should be able to confirm that ZC 3676 exclusion is displayed as selected/active in the Umbrella exclusions list
column25: 2,,,5. Click the Remove button next to Exclusion ZC 3676"
column26: 5. User should be able to click the remove option and see a removal confirmation prompt or see the exclusion removed from the list
column33: 6. User should be able to verify the ZC 3676 exclusion is removed from the Umbrella sub-line and no longer displayed in the active exclusions list
column39: 2,,,7. Verify GL sub-line still contains ZC 3339 exclusion"
column40: 7. User should be able to navigate to GL screen and confirm that ZC 3339 exclusion remains in GL sub-line unaffected
column46: 2,,,8. Price the policy with modified exclusions"
column47: 8. User should be able to click Price and verify pricing calculation completes successfully with updated exclusion configuration
column53: 2,,,9. Generate Quote and verify exclusion changes are reflected"
column54: 9. User should be able to view the quote document and verify ZC 3676 is no longer listed in Umbrella exclusions while ZC 3339 remains in GL
column60: 3,Manual,TC03_Remove Designated Professional Services Exclusion ZC 3339 from GL and Auto-Remove ZC 3676 from Umbrella_Casualty_New Business_AC3"
column61: The objective of this test case is to validate that when Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3339 is removed from GL policy, the system automatically removes ZC 3676 from the Umbrella sub-line.
column62: 1. Navigate to Phoenix application and log in with valid credentials
column63: 1. User should be able to access the Phoenix application successfully and verify login is complete

Description: 2. Load the existing submission created in TC1 with both exclusions
Action: 2. User should be able to successfully load the submission and verify both ZC 3339 (GL) and ZC 3676 (UMB) exclusions are displayed
Scenario Type: 3. User should be able to view the GL Exposures screen with Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3339 currently selected
column18: 3,,,4. Verify Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3339 is currently selected in GL"
column19: 4. User should be able to confirm that ZC 3339 exclusion is displayed as selected/active in the GL exclusions list
column25: 3,,,5. Click the Remove button next to Exclusion ZC 3339"
column26: 5. User should be able to click the remove option and see a removal confirmation prompt or see the exclusion removed from the list
column32: 3,,,6. Confirm removal of ZC 3339 exclusion from GL"
column33: 6. User should be able to verify the ZC 3339 exclusion is removed from the GL sub-line and no longer displayed in the active exclusions list
column39: 3,,,7. Verify the system automatically removes Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3676 from Umbrella"
column40: 7. User should see a system notification or automatically find that ZC 3676 exclusion is removed from Umbrella sub-line when navigating to that screen
column46: 3,,,8. Navigate to Umbrella LOB screen to confirm removal"
column47: 8. User should be able to view the Umbrella LOB screen and verify that ZC 3676 exclusion is no longer listed or selected
column53: 3,,,9. Price the policy with updated exclusion configuration"
column54: 9. User should be able to click Price and verify pricing calculation completes successfully without both exclusions
column60: 3,,,10. Generate Quote and verify both exclusions are removed"
column61: 10. User should be able to view the quote document and verify neither ZC 3339 (GL) nor ZC 3676 (UMB) are listed in the respective LOBs
column67: 4,Manual,TC04_Validate VAL-559 Trigger on Duplicate Schedule Items or Mismatch Between ZC 3339 and ZC 3676_Casualty_New Business_AC4"
column68: The objective of this test case is to validate that VAL-559 validation error is triggered when there is a duplicate entry or mismatch in schedule items between ZC 3339 (GL) and ZC 3676 (Umbrella) exclusions when pricing.
column69: 1. Navigate to Phoenix application and log in with valid credentials
column70: 1. User should be able to access the Phoenix application successfully and verify login is complete

Description: 2. Create a new domestic submission with Casualty lines or load existing submission
Action: 2. User should be able to create/load a submission and navigate to Line Selection screen successfully
Priority: 4,,,3. Navigate to GL Exposures screen and add Exclusion ZC 3339"
Scenario Type: 3. User should be able to add ZC 3339 exclusion to GL and verify it is selected
column18: 4,,,4. Add schedule items (list of covered services/professions) to ZC 3339 exclusion"
column19: 4. User should be able to enter schedule items for ZC 3339 and verify they are displayed in the exclusion configuration
column25: 4,,,5. Navigate to Umbrella LOB screen and add Exclusion ZC 3676"
column26: 5. User should be able to add/select ZC 3676 exclusion and verify it is displayed in Umbrella
column32: 4,,,6. Add schedule items to ZC 3676 exclusion with duplicate entry or different item count"
column33: 6. User should be able to enter schedule items for ZC 3676 with mismatch from ZC 3339 and verify items are accepted for entry
column39: 4,,,7. Fill all mandatory fields in both GL and Umbrella screens"
column40: 7. User should be able to verify all mandatory fields are completed in both LOBs
column46: 4,,,8. Click Price button to initiate pricing calculation"
column47: 8. User should be able to click Price button and system should validate the exclusion schedule items
column53: 4,,,9. Verify VAL-559 validation error is triggered"
column54: 9. User should see VAL-559 validation error message indicating duplicate entries or schedule item mismatch between ZC 3339 and ZC 3676
column60: 4,,,10. Verify pricing is blocked and user cannot proceed with quote"
column61: 10. User should be unable to proceed with Quote/Bind operations until the validation error is resolved
column67: 4,,,11. Correct the schedule items in one of the exclusions to match"
column68: 11. User should be able to edit schedule items and align them between ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 exclusions
column75: 12. User should be able to click Price and verify pricing calculation completes without VAL-559 error
column81: 5,Manual,TC05_Validate UW-418 Trigger When ZC 3339 Present in GL but ZC 3676 Missing in Umbrella at Pricing_Casualty_New Business_AC5"
column82: The objective of this test case is to validate that UW-418 validation error is triggered when user attempts to price a policy having Exclusion ZC 3339 in GL without the corresponding Exclusion ZC 3676 in Umbrella.
column83: 1. Navigate to Phoenix application and log in with valid credentials
column84: 1. User should be able to access the Phoenix application successfully and verify login is complete

Description: 2. Create a new domestic submission with Casualty lines
Action: 2. User should be able to create a new submission and navigate to Line Selection screen successfully
Priority: 5,,,3. Select General Liability (GL) and Umbrella (UMB) products"
Scenario Type: 3. User should be able to select both GL and UMB products and verify they are displayed as selected lines
column19: 4. User should be able to view the GL Exposures screen with all mandatory fields displayed
column25: 5,,,5. Fill all mandatory fields in GL Exposures screen"
column26: 5. User should be able to enter all mandatory field values and verify data is accepted
column32: 5,,,6. Add Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3339 to GL sub-line"
column33: 6. User should be able to add the ZC 3339 exclusion and verify it is displayed in the GL exclusions list
column40: 7. User should be able to view the Umbrella LOB screen with all mandatory fields displayed
column46: 5,,,8. Fill all mandatory fields in Umbrella screen WITHOUT adding ZC 3676 exclusion"
column47: 8. User should be able to enter all mandatory field values and verify data is accepted without Umbrella exclusion
column53: 5,,,9. Click Price button to attempt pricing with mismatched exclusions"
column54: 9. User should be able to click Price button and system should validate the exclusion requirements
column60: 5,,,10. Verify UW-418 validation error is triggered blocking the quote"
column61: 10. User should see UW-418 validation error message indicating that ZC 3339 requires corresponding ZC 3676 in Umbrella, blocking quote generation
column67: 5,,,11. Verify user cannot proceed with Quote/Bind operations"
column68: 11. User should be unable to proceed with Quote or Bind operations while UW-418 error is active
column74: 5,,,12. Add Exclusion ZC 3676 to Umbrella LOB to resolve error"
column75: 12. User should be able to add ZC 3676 exclusion to Umbrella and verify it is displayed as selected
column81: 5,,,13. Retry Price button after adding required exclusion"
column82: 13. User should be able to click Price and verify pricing calculation completes successfully without UW-418 error
column88: 5,,,14. Verify Quote can now be generated successfully"
column89: 14. User should be able to click Quote and verify quote document is generated without validation errors
